name: part_009
file: tmp_【#天音かなた2周年LIVE】無料 3DLIVE 「リベンジ」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Revenge＂【天音かなた⧸ホロライブ】 [Dji-ehIz5_k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs the first song of the section, featuring white-themed stage visuals and floating cube effects.
Transition to the second song 'Rising Hope' with a dynamic shift in lighting and fast-paced editing.

subtitles.original: ねぇ、あしたを叫ぶのなら あたしはここにいるよ
subtitles.english: Hey, if you shout for tomorrow, I'm right here

subtitles.original: ことばが余りあまれどなお、この夢はつづいてく
subtitles.english: Even if words overflow, this dream continues

subtitles.original: あたしがあいをかたるのなら そのすべてはこのうただ
subtitles.english: If I talk about love, it's all in this song

subtitles.original: だれも知らないこのものがたり また口ずさんでしまったみたいだ
subtitles.english: This story that no one knows, it seems I've started humming it again

subtitles.original: 握ったメッセージ that's rising hope
subtitles.english: Grasped message, that's rising hope

subtitles.original: 揺るがない世界 非情な現状 続く壁は何重層？
subtitles.english: Unwavering world, heartless reality, how many layers are the continuing walls?

subtitles.original: イメージ通りなんかいかないし 静かに騒ぎだした本能
subtitles.english: It doesn't go as imagined, and my instincts have quietly started to stir

subtitles.original: 迷路みたい 行き止まりなんだ もう思考はディストーション
subtitles.english: Like a maze, it's a dead end, my thoughts are already distorted

subtitles.original: 容赦ないね いつの間に 見失ったルート、暴れだす
subtitles.english: Relentless, isn't it? Before I knew it, I lost the route, starting to run wild

subtitles.original: (pay attention!)
subtitles.english: (pay attention!)

subtitles.original: Hey what is it?
subtitles.english: Hey what is it?

subtitles.original: (watch your step now!)
subtitles.english: (watch your step now!)

subtitles.original: 常識なんか要らない
subtitles.english: I don't need common sense

subtitles.original: (are you serious!?)
subtitles.english: (are you serious!?)

subtitles.original: no no no, don't worry 1,2,3
subtitles.english: no no no, don't worry 1,2,3

subtitles.original: 吹き返す 心臓のリズム
subtitles.english: Breathing back, the rhythm of the heart

subtitles.original: 視界まだ眩んでる それでも行かなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Visibility is still blurred, but I still have to go

subtitles.original: キミが信じてる僕を 裏切るわけにいかない
subtitles.english: I can't betray the 'me' that you believe in

subtitles.original: 強くクラクションが鳴る
subtitles.english: A loud horn sounds

subtitles.original: 孤独なまま時が経ったって 逃げる事覚えたって
subtitles.english: Even if time passed while being lonely, even if I learned how to run away

subtitles.original: 新しい今日が来ちゃうけど
subtitles.english: A new today will still come

subtitles.original: (feeling bad magic?)
subtitles.english: (feeling bad magic?)

subtitles.original: この願い 例え魔法が無くなったって 叶えなきゃ、誓った
subtitles.english: This wish, even if magic is gone, I have to fulfill it, I swore

subtitles.original: 僕はキミと まだ見ぬ未来 あるんだよ 泣きそうでも
subtitles.english: I have a future with you that we haven't seen yet, even if I'm about to cry

subtitles.original: 悔しくても止まっていられない
subtitles.english: Even if it's frustrating, I can't stay stopped

subtitles.original: 握ったメッセージ that's rising hope
subtitles.english: Grasped message, that's rising hope

subtitles.original: rising hope yeah
subtitles.english: rising hope yeah

subtitles.original: デモ・ケドnonstepでガンガン迫るhard way
subtitles.english: But-however, the hard way approaches relentlessly and nonstop

subtitles.original: (where's the solution!?)
subtitles.english: (where's the solution!?)

subtitles.original: 打ちのめされても get up!
subtitles.english: Even if you're knocked down, get up!

subtitles.original: (and hurry up!)
subtitles.english: (and hurry up!)

subtitles.original: そんな損な時間ならすぐさまゴミ箱
subtitles.english: If it's such a wasteful time, put it in the trash right away

subtitles.original: 後悔なんて塵埃同然 さあ 2 step OK shouting OK 欲張りあそばせ
subtitles.english: Regrets are just like dust. Now, 2 step OK, shouting OK, be as greedy as you like

subtitles.original: 可否も賛否も全部僕のもの 飛ばせ 心臓のアルゴリズム
subtitles.english: Whether it's right or wrong, approval or disapproval, it's all mine. Let it fly, the algorithm of the heart

subtitles.original: ほら 守りたいんだって 僕の声が伝播した
subtitles.english: See, 'I want to protect you,' my voice has propagated

subtitles.original: 異論反論は許すと この想いは不用意に科学できないでしょう？
subtitles.english: Allowing objections and counterarguments, this feeling cannot be easily explained by science, right?

subtitles.original: 聞いてよ 辿り着いた正解 言わなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Listen, the answer I arrived at, I have to say it

subtitles.original: キミがくれる想いの全部を信じていける
subtitles.english: I can believe in all the feelings you give me

subtitles.original: それが嘘かどうかなんて わからなくてもいい
subtitles.english: It doesn't matter if it's a lie or not

subtitles.original: 誰かが示す見本ってなんだっけ 普通の愛って何だっけ
subtitles.english: What was that example someone showed? What was 'normal love' again?

subtitles.original: 僕は今日も僕に問いかける
subtitles.english: I ask myself again today

subtitles.original: 問いかける度 手に入れるのは 変わらない真実
subtitles.english: Every time I ask, what I get is the unchanging truth

subtitles.original: 「僕は要らない まだ見たい未来があるから」
subtitles.english: 'I don't need it, because there's a future I still want to see'

subtitles.original: 孤独なんかは消えて無くなって 逃げる事嫌になって
subtitles.english: Solitude disappears and is gone, I grew to hate running away

subtitles.original: 新しい今日を探すんだよ
subtitles.english: I'm searching for a new today

subtitles.original: (feeling bad magic?)
subtitles.english: (feeling bad magic?)

subtitles.original: この願い 例え魔法が無くなったって 叶えなきゃ、誓った
subtitles.english: This wish, even if magic is gone, I have to fulfill it, I swore

subtitles.original: 僕とキミで 創れる未来ならもう近い
subtitles.english: The future we can create together is already near

subtitles.original: 僕の右手 キミの左手 そっと繋いで
subtitles.english: My right hand, your left hand, gently holding them

subtitles.original: 握ったメッセージ that's rising hope
subtitles.english: Grasped message, that's rising hope

subtitles.original: 離さないから that's rising hope
subtitles.english: I won't let go, that's rising hope

subtitles.original: rising hope
subtitles.english: rising hope
